Package be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.controllers.calendarControllers

Class CalendarController

java.lang.Object
be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.controllers.Controller
be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.controllers.calendarControllers.CalendarController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CalendarViewController.ViewListener 
public class CalendarController
extends Controller
implements CalendarViewController.ViewListener
Main controller class for the calendar's view. Handles the monthly and weekly view.
